paragraphs: This document explained the process of creating a technical document.
This document outlines the steps to create a technical document within the system. It is intended for users who need to generate documentation for various purposes.
This guide provides a step-by-step approach to creating a technical document, ensuring clarity and accuracy in your documentation process.
outcomes: Understand the process of creating a technical document.
Learn how to navigate the interface to create a technical document.
Familiarize yourself with the different options and settings available for creating a technical document.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Inventory section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the "Inventory" option in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Access the Purchase Orders section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the "Purchase Orders" option under the Inventory section in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the creation of a new Purchase Order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Create PO" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Vendor Code input field to select a vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the "Vendor Code" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, "Cosmetics".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Phone input field to enter the vendor's phone number.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the "Phone" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's phone number.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's phone number, for example, "09207917777".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's address in the Vendor Address field.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's address in the "Vendor Address" textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the calendar icon to select a PO Due Date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the "PO Due Date" field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a date from the calendar interface, for example, the "3rd".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the date selection.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Ok" button to confirm the selected date.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the vendor's terms in the Vendor Terms field.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the vendor's terms in the "Vendor Terms" textarea, for example, "Ship within 2 weeks".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the calendar icon to select a Vendor Ship By Date.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the calendar icon next to the "Vendor Ship By Date" field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a date from the calendar.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a date from the calendar interface, for example, the "3rd".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Confirm the date selection.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Ok" button to confirm the selected date.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Location input field to select a location.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Location" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a location from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a location from the dropdown list, for example, "Kerala".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Venue input field to select a venue.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Venue" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a venue from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a venue from the dropdown list, for example, "Kollam Store".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the PO Terms input field to select PO Terms.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "PO Terms" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the shipping address in the Shipping Address field.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the shipping address in the "Shipping Address" textarea.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the dropdown to select shipping options.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the dropdown to select shipping options, for example, "Ship all the Items to the Kerala Warehouse".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click on the Freight only input field to select freight options.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Freight only" input field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a freight option from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a freight option from the dropdown list, for example, "Freight only".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Item Lookup" button to add items to the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Item Lookup" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the items to be added to the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Select the checkbox next to the desired items.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Select Items" button to add the selected items.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Select Items" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item to be ordered.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity in the "QTY" field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Save" button to save the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Save" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Approve" button to approve the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Approve" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter approval notes in the PO approval notes field.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter approval notes in the "PO approval notes" textarea, for example, "Approving Purchase Order".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "APPROVE" button to finalize the approval.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "APPROVE" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "Send To Vendor" button to send the purchase order to the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Send To Vendor" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Merchandise Receiving section.
Steps / How-To.step: Click on the "Merchandise Receiving" option under the Inventory section in the left navigation sidebar.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the receiving of merchandise.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "Receive Merchandise" button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a vendor from the dropdown list, for example, "Cosmetics Vendor".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Check the "purchase order" checkbox.
Steps / How-To.step: Check the "purchase order" checkbox.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a PO from the dropdown list.
Steps / How-To.step: Choose a PO from the dropdown list, for example, "2025/6/2/38".

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item to be received.
Steps / How-To.step: Enter the quantity in the "QTY Received" field.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Click the "RECEIVE" button to finalize the receiving of merchandise.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the "RECEIVE" button.

Title: Creating a Technical Document
docTitle: How to Create a Technical Document
shortDescription: Step-by-step guide on creating a technical document.
